name: Digital TV DVR Recording
summary: Learn about .TSP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Some TSP files can be played with Zoom Player, but often times they must be "demuxed" into audio and video files separately and then reconstructed into a new video file before they can be played.

description: MPEG-2 Transport (TSP) video file created by a DVR such as a DISH Network DVR; contains a recorded TV show or movie saved to the DVR's hard drive; can use different encoding formats for the audio and video streams and therefore may be difficult to decode or play on a standard software video player.
